## gpioSetAlertsFunc() function

This sets up a callback to be called when an alert GPIO changes state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function gpioSetAlertsFunc(handle: number, gpio: number, callback: (alerts: GpioAlert[]) => void): void;
```
